The wielder cannot gain both effects at the same time from a single piece of equipment.
Accessory_Effect: Whenever the wearer’s troop deals ranged direct damage or ranged smite damage, it has a 50% chance to increase the damage by 30%. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Refined_Accessory_Effect: Whenever the wearer’s troop deals ranged direct damage or ranged smite damage, it has a 50% chance to increase the damage by 40%. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
